resources.string:
Ad created using: 


<tv.superawesome.superawesomesdk.view.BannerView 
 android:id="@+id/banner_container" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" 
 android:layout_centerHorizontal="true" 
 custom:placementID="5687" 
 custom:testMode="true"> 
 </tv.superawesome.superawesomesdk.view.BannerView>

Ad created using: 


<tv.superawesome.superawesomesdk.view.InterstitialView 
 android:id="@+id/interstitial_container" 
 android:layout_width="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_height="wrap_content" 
 android:layout_alignParentBottom="true" 
 custom:placementID="5692" 
 custom:testMode="true" 
 custom:showInstantly="false"> 
 </tv.superawesome.superawesomesdk.view.InterstitialView>
This activity uses a gamewall. There is a button below that only shows when the gamewall has items available to display.
